article_title: Health Group Of The Year: Sidley Austin
article_text:
Health Group Of The Year: Sidley Austin

Law360, New York (January 8, 2016, 3:43 PM ET) -- A rare win limiting the implementation of the Affordable Care Act and the successful defense of one of the most successful orphan drug companies from anti-kickback allegations have helped earn Sidley Austin LLP recognition as one of Law360’s Health Care Groups of the Year.



While Central Life Insurance Co.’s suit alleging the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services overstepped its bounds with a rule limiting coverage for fixed indemnity plans wasn’t front-page news, Sidley’s national health care practice head Paul E. Kalb said it...

To view the full article, register now.
